name: Runes Out
description:
Runes Out Change all the runes to green! 

Runes Out is a short puzzle game based on “lights out” puzzles, which I made as practice in a couple of hours.

  • 10 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Score points based on how many clicks you can solve a level
Instructions
  • Game is played with a mouse.
  • Clicking a rune changes itself and the runes next to it horizontally and vertically. (So not diagonally)
  • You can reset the level by clicking the button in the bottom right.
  • After level 10 you’ll see a “Well Done” Screen and your final score. This is the end of the game!
Credits
  • Created in Godot 3.4.4
  • All pixel art and music are made by me
  • Soundeffects: https://freesound.org
  • Font: Pixelplay by The Shevchuk
